features: 【Mop with Patented Steel Jaw Clamp】We have designed a professional steel jaw clamp for the mops for floor cleaning, which solves the problem that plastic jaw clamps are easy to break and general jaw clamps are easy to rust. The labor-saving trigger allows you to easily fix the mop head. Universal fit for most Looped-end cotton mop head.

【Super Absorbent Cotton Mop】Commercial string mops for floor cleaning include Recycled cotton mop heads---The large Machine Washable looped-end mop head, which has super water absorption, and yarn tailband prevent the loops from getting tangle and reduce fraying. It can easily remove the dirt on the floor and absorb the water stains on the floor surface. The cotton mop head is large enough to cover a large area at one time and easily complete housework and commercial cleaning jobs.

【Heavy-Duty Mops for Floor Cleaning】Commercial Industrial Home Grade Wet Mop, Choose very good quality material , highly versatile mop is able to absorb any dirty water quickly and clean all types of mess. Heavy-duty wet mop set is best for commercial industrial and household floor cleaning jobs.

【Telescopic Long Handle】Mops for floor cleaning has Steel Poles is strudy enough to hold the heavy duty mop, and the lenght can be adjusted from 42 inch to 59 inch. No need to bend for mopping the floor, improve the comfort of use.

【Multi-Surface Use】Eyliden versatile mops for floor cleaning is great for commercial and home use that suitable for concrete floor, hardwood floor, tile floor or marble floor. It is widely cleaning for all kinds of places likes workshop, hotel, mall, lobby, warehouse, office, restaurant, kitchen, bathroom and garage.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Eyliden Heavy Duty Commercial Cotton Mop Looped-End String Wet Industrial Mops with Extendable Handle and Patent Steel Jaw Clamp Industrial Grade Wet Mop: The heavy duty mop is ideal for home and commercial mopping. Great for outdoor indoor use.Commercial mop easy to install and storage.Includes one recycled cotton mop head with looped ends for optimal absorption without fraying.Telescopic Long Handle: Steel poles is strudy enough to hold the heavy duty mop, and the lenght can be adjusted from 42 inch to 59 inch. No need to bend for mopping the floor, improve the comfort of use.High-quality cotton material mop head offer Higher Absorbency and Strength.Sturdy Sewing Neat Lines, Firmly Fixed Mop Head, Good for Long-Term Use.Scratch Free, No hair loss, Safe for all Hard Floor Surface.Long-lasting fibres allows mop head to be laundered many times giving it a longer service life.Suitable for all kinds of floors: Wooden floor, Marble floor, Hard floor, Tile floor and more.Compatible with: a----Universal Headband made from Cotton Polyester Band. Fits Clamp-Style and Side Loading Handles and Easy to Wash.b----The patented universal steel jaw clamp is suitable for most String Mop Heads Replacement on the market.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Works well, but only clamps best with a brand new mop head. If the mop head wears down it becomes thinner and the clamp isn’t as tight and the mop head starts to come out. Overall easy to use and seems durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and easy to attach mop head!
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy - and easy to clip the mop head on and off. Mop and then simply unclip mop head and toss in the washer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Mop head is heavy, not great for condo living
reviews.reviewText: It is easy to assemble. It is a quality mop head. But it is a huge mop head, which makes it heavy and very hard to wring out by hand. This is the kind of mop you would see used in a high school or large business. It's too much mop for my two bedroom condo. It is difficult to mop in tight small corners and under dressers. Its a good mop but be mindful that it isn't great for small apartments or condo living.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absorbent cotton material , no polyester fibre which just glides over the surface.
reviews.reviewText: I use this mop for ceramic floors. I need material which will get the dirt out of the grouted areas. Only cotton achieves this and this is a very effective tool. I have purchased and discarded other mops because they are not made of absorbent material. Very high quality.FINALLY!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Use it daily for the house. Great Product :-)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Broke in 15 minutes
reviews.reviewText: The plastic handle is cheaply cast. The threads that hold the mop head to the stick stripped from like 5 minutes of mopping. The metal head is nice though

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best mop I've ever owned
reviews.reviewText: Ive purchased expensive mops and cheap ones. After finding this item I will never buy a different brand and or style. Super simple to switch out the mop head. Seems to be holding up super well. Highly recommend for any one that is mopping daily!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good mop!
reviews.reviewText: The mop was very easy to put together. Very sturdy and a good size. I'm 5'2 and the handle is long so I don't need to bend over. Makes cleaning a breeze. I would recommend this mop to anyone.

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy practico y cómodo, lo recomiendo bastante
reviews.reviewText: Muy practico y cómodo, lo recomiendo bastante
This does an excellent job. The size allows for a large space to be covered each time. It therefore, gets the job done in a quicker time frame. It's also sturdy and strong. Love it!

en general el trapeador es buena relacion calidad-precio.al principio fur dificil colocar el mop en el sujetador, pero ya que lo utilizas se vuelve mas amigable quitar y ponerlo para lavarlo diariamente.recomendable!

reviews.reviewTitle: Love how thick the threads are
reviews.reviewText: I like the way it works around the corners and drums quickly . Great mops .

reviews.reviewTitle: Mops Well, But Getting Mop Head On Is a Headache
reviews.reviewText: The mop comes with two mop heads, of which I've only used one so far. It certainly works well for mopping the floor, though I do have two gripes about it (one minor, one major):1. I wash my mop head after (almost) each use. The cotton definitely pilled quite a bit and the blue fabric looks quite aged after a handful of washes (though this may be related to point 2 below). This technically doesn't matter, but it's something to keep in mind if you plan on washing the mop head frequently.2. Getting the mop head on is not easy. Maybe my handle is defective, but it takes quite a bit of effort to push the blue part into the handle because of the teeth on the end of the handle. I've tried going in through the side, ramming it in, going slowly... Once it's in and you've locked it, it's a great mop, but it's a pain to get the mop head on. So much so that sometimes I'll just get on my hands and knees and clean the floor because I can't be bothered with assembly.I'd say if you don't need to change your mop head very often, then the issues I mentioned aren't so annoying. But I certainly wouldn't wholeheartedly recommend this mop because of the inconveniences. Three stars because once put together, it works great.
